item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.content:encoded:
Wow. Just read the Tseric link. That guy doesn’t need a vacation–he needs a new job. Yeah, the community reps have it bad, and there’s no way they get paid enough to take that kind of crud. But if you get to the point he has, it’s time to just walk away, not wallow in it.

And while he does make some good points, I couldn’t help noting this one: “an uncrafted and improvisational campaign of misery and spin-doctoring”

Umm, isn’t that kind of contradictory? Either it’s a campaign, or it’s ‘uncrafted and improvisational.’ It can’t really be both. He soooo needs to find a new job before he cracks the rest of the way. Hopefully it’ll be something relaxing.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Anon - WoW (pun!) That guy needs a vacation.
Keystone - was a happy coincidence that I picked two water shots, showing how each game handles water differently. (I'm NOT saying WoW is bad, just different.)
Anyways, WoW = Zul'Aman in the Ghostlands as a few people said.
LOTRO = Nen Harn, far northeastern Breeland, looking towards Nan Wathren in North Downs.
item.content:encoded:
Anon – WoW (pun!) That guy needs a vacation.

Keystone – was a happy coincidence that I picked two water shots, showing how each game handles water differently. (I’m NOT saying WoW is bad, just different.)

Anyways, WoW = Zul’Aman in the Ghostlands as a few people said.

LOTRO = Nen Harn, far northeastern Breeland, looking towards Nan Wathren in North Downs.

item.title: By: Steven

item.description: For the first I'm guessing Azshara, since it's the only place in WoW I haven't been since signing up opening day...
item.content:encoded: For the first I’m guessing Azshara, since it’s the only place in WoW I haven’t been since signing up opening day…
